cab.content: J0^^3^^ (This Document is the Property of2005Operations.His Britannic Majesty's Government)12SECRET.From: To: -1234.General Barter, Russia. C.I.G.S., War Office.8.9.17.11.30 p.m.;:V. Spirits of 5th and 12th Armies are very bad. ::'; Soldiers committee has taken complete charge of everything. G.0.C. 12th Army, Army commissary and Army Committee being tried by court martial for publishing lying account of recent disaster.;: Locker-Lamps on states .great improvement in morale of 7th Army. 11th also improved/ but not to such an extent. Committees activity strictly limited to matters of interior economy. In many cases drafts attempting disorders are flogged. Extreme measures being freely used. Officers have much more power than formerly.Nothing to report on northern front.Enemy now in touch. Aircraft reconnaissance state only 1 front of Riga railway bridge destroyed. .Prisoner states his regiment forced Dvina without loss.meeting with no resistance. There were no counter-attacks. The other prisoner states his regiment met with no resistance. Russians ran in both cases.
